name: adonai-farm-management
description: Complete farm management system for livestock, workers, and operations

scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.railway:build: echo 'Starting Railway build process...' && npm run railway:install && npm run railway:build-frontend
scripts.railway:install: echo 'Installing backend dependencies...' && cd backend && npm ci --only=production && echo 'Installing frontend dependencies...' && cd ../frontend && npm ci
scripts.railway:build-frontend: echo 'Building frontend...' && cd frontend && npm run build && echo 'Frontend build complete'
scripts.railway:start: echo 'Starting Railway deployment...' && cd backend && npm run railway:migrate && npm run railway:serve
scripts.railway:migrate: echo 'Running database migration...' && if [ -n "$DATABASE_URL" ]; then echo 'PostgreSQL detected, running migration...' && node scripts/pg_migrate.js; else echo 'No DATABASE_URL found, skipping migration'; fi

author: Adonai Farm
